title: Find Last Matching Value
description: In this lab, we will delve into JavaScript programming and explore the concept of finding the last matching value in an array. This lab provides an opportunity to enhance your understanding of JavaScript array methods and functional programming techniques. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to use the Array.prototype.filter() and Array.prototype.pop() methods to find the last element that meets a certain condition.

meta.title: Find the Last Matching Value in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to use JavaScript array methods to find the last element that meets a certain condition.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, pop, javascript practice online, filter, javascript lab, last matching value, javascript tutor, array

verify.name: Verify Student's Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 查找最后一个匹配值
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将深入研究JavaScript编程，并探索在数组中查找最后一个匹配值的概念。本实验提供了一个机会，可增强你对JavaScript数组方法和函数式编程技术的理解。在本实验结束时，你将牢固掌握如何使用Array.prototype.filter()和Array.prototype.pop()方法来找到满足特定条件的最后一个元素。

meta.title: 在JavaScript中查找最后一个匹配值
meta.description: 学习如何使用JavaScript数组方法找到满足特定条件的最后一个元素。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, pop, 在线JavaScript练习, filter, JavaScript实验, 最后一个匹配值, JavaScript教程, 数组
